english.segment1: Grey's my favorite color. Black and white has never been my thing. I'll take my drink lukewarm now. Hot and cold is not the thing for me
english.segment2: Absolutes are hidden. I've buried my convictions
english.segment3: [Chorus:]. I cannot be blind no more. Numb to what I'm living for. Help me stop this compromise that justifies these lies. I need Your passion in this life
english.segment4: I don't want to impose. Who really needs to know what I believe. Cause no one likes rockin' boats. And who would care to see the way I see
english.segment5: So give me the fire, yeah. God give me Your fire. And raise this life higher
